name: arduinogpthex
description: A Arduino Hex Uploader for Android devices, via USB OTG

scripts.push: (git add . && git commit -m "I'm a bigger pusher than Ice-T homie !!!" && git push) || exit 0
scripts.first-push: npm run git-init && git add . && git commit -m "first commit" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin git@github.com:lanouvelleecole/ArduinoGPTHex.git && git push -u origin main

author: JEAN LOUIS DONAT
